data.title: Where to publish your writing about China

data.text:
Savannah Billman

·

Follow

5 min read

·

Sep 20, 2021

--

A growing list of digital zines and websites to publish your China-related content: news, features, poetry, fiction, and more.

Did you write something pretty awesome about China?

You should publish it! To help freelance writers working on anything China-related, I made a list of as many media outlets and literary journals I could find that will publish content from, about, or involving China.

Most of the sites here are in English (there are some Spanish, Chinese, and Portuguese-language too). If I missed any great places to publish China-focused work, leave a comment!

If you’re looking for a career in the writing-about-China sector, this is also a great list of organizations to bookmark and follow their job listings.

This list is in no particular order, and right now doesn’t include any academic journals. Research on Spanish-language sites by Emilia A Dyer.

(Use Ctrl+F and search this list for whatever content you want; try “poetry” or “tech” or “analysis”)

The Cleaver Quarlerly https://www.thecleaverquarterly.com/pitch

Chinese food! food trends within China, Taiwan and Hong Kong (historic, current and speculative), how Chinese food has evolved overseas to accommodate foreign tastes and non-traditional ingredients, Chinese food in art and pop culture, industrial production and packaging of Chinese food (farms, factories, supermarkets)

Interview, Q&A, longform essay, photography, infographic, reported article

China Highlights https://www.chinahighlights.com/aboutus/jobs-volunteer.htm

We are looking for conscientious and creative editors with an eye for detail, a passion for accuracy, and travel marketing ability. Those based in China/Asia or who have traveled a lot in this region are preferred.

China Temper https://chinatemper.com/write-for-us

Articles should hone in on China Fashion, Design or Urban Culture, or at the very least have implications for these. We’re interested in everything ranging from broad fashion designers, emerging brands and stores even, first- and second-tier cultural streamings or fashio-socio shifts to trends and social media implications at play in China Fashion — from the shoe cobbling artisan to the fashion-tech bag aficionado/-a.

New Bloom Magazine https://newbloommag.net/submit/

We look for well-written, innovative work in journalism, commentary, book reviews, interviews, historical analysis, but also in art, short films, and other creative pursuits related to the political, cultural and social realities of Asia.

Future CHOICE: https://chinaobservers.eu/future-choice-call-for-articles/

A platform for Central and Eastern European (CEE) grad and post-grad students or young professionals to publish articles on topics dealing with the Chinese presence in Europe or relations between China and European countries, with a special focus on CEE.

China Channel: https://chinachannel.org/submit/

Reviews, essays, translation, photography, multimedia

Brush Talks http://brushtalks.com/submissions.html

General essays, travel essays, profiles, memoir, narrative nonfiction, photographs, poems, poetry

Spittoon https://spittooncollective.com/magazine/submit/

Reviews, poems & poetry, fiction, nonfiction, experimental

China Hands Magazine https://chinahandsmagazine.org/contribute/

Analysis of US-China issues, or Chinese domestic issues with global implications

Academic articles (ideal for students to publish papers)

The Diplomat https://thediplomat.com/write-for-us/

Asia Pacific-focused original reporting, analysis, commentary

The Shanghai Literary Review https://www.shanghailiterary.com/submissions

Fiction, poetry, nonfiction and essays, flash fiction, visual art, translation, book reviews

TechNode https://technode.com/write-for-us/

Journalism, news, analysis, commentary about current and future trends in Chinese tech

SupChina https://supchina.com/submit/

China-focused news, profiles, Q and A, op-ed

ChinaFile https://www.chinafile.com/contact

Stories, projects, columns, or new sections

The World of Chinese https://www.theworldofchinese.com/join-us/

Storytelling about China (history, arts, literature, fiction, culture)

Rest of World https://restofworld.org/about/contact-us/

Global tech reporting, covers China and Asia issues

Radii China https://radiichina.com/contribute/

Stories about contemporary China that fall under the categories of entertainment, art/design, music, society, and lifestyle

Sixth Tone https://www.sixthtone.com/contribute

Trending topics, long reads, reporting, photography, videography (news, culture, entertainment, gender, education, lifestyle, arts, sports, aging, etc)

China Dialogue https://chinadialogue.net/en/pitch/

Articles on global environmental issues, in Chinese or English

Young Post https://www.scmp.com/yp/report/latest-reports/article/3068956/guide-how-write-young-post

Articles written by teens/for teens, centered on Hong Kong, covering interesting topics from personal issues to global affairs

China Brief https://nuvoices.com/2021/08/11/contribute-to-china-brief-our-five-tips-for-policy-writing/ and https://jamestown.org/about-us/contact-us/

Substantive, timely, and fact-based strategic analysis about economic, political, and security issues related to China and the country’s foreign relations

NüVoices https://nuvoices.com/submissions/

Reported features, narrative essays, op-eds, tutorials, Q&As, fiction, translations and listicles, visual content, photos, illustrations (for digital and print anthologies)

Pandaily https://pandaily.com/contribution/

Original reporting, commentary on Chinese tech, business, internet culture

China Admissions https://www.china-admissions.com/blog/study-abroad-experience-in-china/

Personal essays/photos/videos about international study abroad student experiences in Chinese universities

Chaoyang Trap House https://chaoyangtrap.house/pitch/

Online/internet culture in China, unusual cultures, tech trends, phenomenon, fandoms, feelings, nonsense, field notes, ethnographies, photo essays

Unpublished and first-time writers encouraged

Lausan HK https://lausan.hk/contact/

Leftist/anti-imperialist Hong Kong outlet seeking videography, illustrations, graphics, original and translated writing/analysis about Hong Kong or US/Asian imperialism

China Africa Project https://chinaafricaproject.com/faq/

China-Africa reporting and analysis

Unclear if they accept submissions, but are very open to email requests

Observa China https://www.observachina.com/sobre (Portuguese)

Political, economic, social, artistic, cultural and philosophical topics

Associated projects can be submitted

Asiademica http://www.asiademica.com/call-for-papers/ (Spanish)

Opportunity to publish an adapted version of your college or master’s thesis

Ecos de Asia http://revistacultural.ecosdeasia.com/ (Spanish)

Short essays, criticism, journalistic articles

Modern Diplomacy https://moderndiplomacy.eu/contribute-modern-diplomacy/

Opinion pieces, new ideas, essays, policy analysis, op-eds, book reviews, rigorous and intellectual writing about European issues and global issues (additional focus on Middle East, Africa, Asia)

Asia Times https://asiatimes.com/write-for-us/

News articles, analysis pieces and op-eds about Pan-Asian news

Diplomatic Courier https://www.diplomaticourier.com/submissions

Photography, videography, essays, articles, analysis on global affairs, diplomacy, negotiations, and conflict resolution for a global audience

Africa Times https://africatimes.com/contact/contributor-guidelines/

Articles, blogs, commentary, news, China-Africa issues and Chinese issues with global perspective

Foreign Affairs https://www.foreignaffairs.com/contact-us#4

American foreign policy and global affairs, commentary, essays, book reviews, analysis, current events, policy issues, letters to the editor

Foreign Policy https://foreignpolicy.submittable.com/submit

Original reporting, argument, analysis, news, politics, culture, and world events

Asymptote Journal https://www.asymptotejournal.com/submit/

Translated poetry, fiction, nonfiction and drama; certain types of original English-language nonfiction, including literary and critical writing; as well as visual art

A Shanghai Poetry Zine http://giuseppedaddeo.com/magazine.html

Poetry and visual art

Email to ashanghaipoetryzine@yahoo.com, WeChat official account: 上海PoetryZine

Asia Literary Review https://www.asialiteraryreview.com/submissions

Literary fiction and non-fiction, reportage, memoir, travel writing, poetry and photographic essays from, about, or related to Asia

Element Mag https://www.elementmag.asia/

Stories, photos, articles related to gay men’s fashion, lifestyle, entertainment, Asian LGBTQ issues

Pitch to: edit@elementmag.asia

Eunoia Review https://eunoiareview.wordpress.com/submissions/

Original, previously unpublished poetry, fiction and creative non-fiction, based in Singapore

Alluvium http://www.literaryshanghai.com/submissions-guidelines/

prose, poetry, and literary translations related to Shanghai, China, and Asia

Made in China Journal https://madeinchinajournal.com/contacts/

Contributions related to Chinese labor, civil society, and rights, articles, analysis

Chinochano http://chinochano.org/colabora (Spanish)

Politics, culture, anecdotes and experiences, photography

Orientando

https://www.uv.mx/chinaveracruz/destacadas/se-convoca-a-todos-los-interesados-en-publicar-en-la-revista-orientando-del-centro-de-estudios-china-veracruz/ (Spanish)

Economy, culture, society
